title: CDA Chairman visits Jinnah Convention Center to oversee renovation
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 24 (APP): Chairman Capital Development Authority (CDA), Muhammad Ali Randhawa Wednesday visited the Jinnah Convention Center to review the ongoing renovation work.
Senior officials from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs accompanied him during the visit.
The renovation aims to upgrade the convention center to international standards, providing an excellent venue for various global events and conferences in Islamabad.
Chairman Randhawa emphasized the importance of developing the Jinnah Convention Center as a hub for international diplomacy and events.
The renovation is expected to improve Islamabad’s infrastructure, enhancing its capacity to host high-profile international gatherings.
The CDA Chairman directed the authorities to ensure the renovation meets international standards, aligning with the government’s vision to promote Islamabad as a center for global events and diplomacy.
